last_episode_to_air.name: A Story Begins
last_episode_to_air.overview: Mina, Doc, Taiyo, and the crew try to evacuate everyone from the space station. Meanwhile, Toya makes one last stand to save them all.

name: The Orbital Children
overview: In 2045, two children born on the moon and three kids from Earth try to survive after an accident on their space station leaves them stranded.

episodes.name: Extraterrestrial Emissaries
episodes.overview: Born on the moon, Toya half-heartedly welcomes three kids from Earth to his home in space. But during the welcome party a terrifying accident occurs.

episodes.name: Mist and Darkness
episodes.overview: Toya and Taiyo make their way through the station to find their friends after the shockwave from the passing comet knocks out oxygen and the internet.

episodes.name: Lunatic Seven
episodes.overview: The rabbit mascot comes to aid the children, who are trapped in a room leaking air. But to escape, the kids must walk outside in space to reach a ship.

episodes.name: Seven's Pattern
episodes.overview: Toya makes contact with his uncle, the Captain, but further disaster threatens the kids and humanity as a whole when someone takes over the station.

episodes.name: A Story Ends
episodes.overview: The kids learn the truth about the harrowing prophecy of Seven and the extremists who support him as comets continue to hurdle toward Earth.

episodes.name: A Story Begins
episodes.overview: Mina, Doc, Taiyo, and the crew try to evacuate everyone from the space station. Meanwhile, Toya makes one last stand to save them all.
